meanings.sent1: She is the snippiest person in our group when things don't go her way.
meanings.sent2: The cat looked snippiest when the dog kept barking at it.
meanings.sent3: The snippiest squirrel in the park got upset when a bird stole its nut.
meanings.sent4: His snippiest mood was like a storm brewing on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The snippiest customer at the store demanded to speak to the manager.

meanings.sent3: The snippiest cat in the shelter meowed loudly for attention.
meanings.sent4: The wind blew snippiest through the trees, rustling the leaves.
meanings.sent5: The teacher spoke snippiest when students kept interrupting the lesson.
